definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate

sentences.english: I really encourage you to take time to make these garnishes.
sentences.chinese: 我真的推薦你抽時間製作這些裝飾物。

sentences.english: Many adornments were carved on the temple walls.
sentences.chinese: 寺院的牆壁上刻著很多裝飾物。

sentences.english: I guess I’d better get out the Christmas ornaments.
sentences.chinese: 我想我最好把聖誕節裝飾物掛出去。

sentences.english: Not to permit any addition of decoration of an inflammable nature.
sentences.chinese: 不准許加設易燃的裝飾物。

sentences.english: What garnishes come with the salmon steak?
sentences.chinese: 鮭魚排上加些什麼裝飾物呢？

sentences.english: There are some stores, especially in Asia that use bottles, makes it into a decoration.
sentences.chinese: 特別是在亞洲，有一些店鋪會把空瓶做成裝飾物。

sentences.english: The bizarre range features a number of adornments which hang on wire from contact lenses.
sentences.chinese: 這串奇異的裝飾物可以掛在隱形眼鏡上。

sentences.english: The adornments do not cohere with the basic design.
sentences.chinese: 裝飾物與設計的基調不協調。

sentences.english: Wine Bottle Decoration can be made from empty wine bottles which can be recycled and given as a gift.
sentences.chinese: 酒瓶裝飾物是由一些可以再利用的空酒瓶製成的禮物。

sentences.english: Designated glassware and garnishes for drinks.
sentences.chinese: 各種飲料所用的杯子和裝飾物。

sentences.english: Straw plaiting is a method of manufacturing textiles by braiding straw. Straw is plaited to produce products including hats and ornaments.
sentences.chinese: 草編工藝指用稻草來編織物品，包括帽子和裝飾物。

sentences.english: Her arms are decked with jewelled ornaments of gold.
sentences.chinese: 在女神的腳下，其他的裝飾物之中，是金色的腳鐲。

sentences.english: Location covered with red carpet, red walls decorated with gold background decoration.
sentences.chinese: 拍攝地點鋪有紅色地毯，背景爲紅牆飾以金色裝飾物。

sentences.english: The seamstress bordered the dress with flowers.
sentences.chinese: 女裁縫給連衣裙鑲上花狀裝飾物。

sentences.english: She likes to wreathe flowers into ornaments when she is free.
sentences.chinese: 她有時喜歡把花紮成裝飾物。

sentences.english: Along with the arrows, he has copper knives, ornaments, and pottery.
sentences.chinese: 除了箭，他還有銅質小刀，裝飾物和陶器。

definition: original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
veined pattern/wrinkles/vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
living spirit, living image (idiom); true to life/vivid and realistic
